body: This will ever ever  be my favorite naruhina art
Bro only if they made Naruto look like Naruto from Jiraiya's book tales of a gutsy ninja
I know the author say by himself he not good make romance thing, can't blame him. but i hope the last movie is actual just a doujinshi and this one is offccial now.

I'm really impressed how the artist able to make such a remarkable storyline, the artistry was as good as the original version* (thats one thing I'm really impressed about.. it made be believe that , thats how would Naruto react to this very situation!!!!!!) thank you for making justice to the original version, as if this is  the missing piece for us be able to understand how Naruto really fell in love with Hinata* and how his character matured* thank you for making such wonderful story, This might be greedy, but I look forward for mor #narutohinta stories coming on your point of view!!!! Please make more!!!! Again, thank you.
Really intresting to imagine how those two years went about. I really like Hinata helping him eat ramen.
Naruto and Hinata will always be a favorite in my heart, no matter how much time may pass. I read this over and over and I still love it. It's just so sweet! XD
no matter how many times i read this story, it's always SWEEEEEEET !!! >,<
